duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on meaningful projects that will help patients and customers see brilliantly.
Personal and professional development, high visibility, coaching, and mentoring opportunities.
Accelerating digitalization and support for adoption and integration of current independent software platforms.
Eliminate paper processes and access the tremendous value of integrated digital systems and data analytics.
Work on next-generation 3D camera systems and contribute to different aspects of the product development.
Design, test, and iterate implantable devices, mechanical design, modeling, and simulation work.
Documentation, collaboration, project management, and statistics.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in an accredited university or college pursuing a Bachelors level degree in Mechanical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Bioengineering, Optics/Optical Engineering, Opto-Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Physics, Vision Science, Optometry, Systems, Aerospace or related major.
